title: Pixel 3 XL intermittent BT connectivity to 2019 Accord issues
content: I have deleted the phone from the car settings.  I have deleted the Honda Link config from phone several times.  I even reset my Pixel 3 XL to factory defaults over the weekend and about 1 out of every 4 times I start my car it will not connect to my phone.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
